definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Aim To discern the false from the genuine of Dexamethasone Acetate Tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析醋酸地塞米松片僞品的質量狀況。

sentences.english: Conclusion This eye drops may be stored for 4 months at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 結論地塞米松氯黴素滴眼液的有效期暫定爲4個月。

sentences.english: In the 36 controls, gentamycin and dexamethasone was used as the irrigation fluid.
sentences.chinese: 對照組36眼淚道阻塞用慶大黴素和地塞米松沖洗。

sentences.english: The patient's symptoms had improved with tobramycin and dexamethasone ophthalmic ointment (TobraDex, Alcon).
sentences.chinese: 應用妥布黴素地塞米松滴眼液後，患者症狀減輕。

sentences.english: The result shows that DXM can lead to the carcinogenesis in the forestomach epithelial of the mice.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，地塞米松對小鼠前胃上皮有促癌作用。

sentences.english: DEXA stands for dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry.
sentences.chinese: 地塞米松主張雙能X線骨密度。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare dexamethasone acetate spray and establish a standard for quality control.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備醋酸地塞米松噴霧劑並建立質量控制方法。

sentences.english: In groups BC and DXM, the edema of brain tissues was reduced.
sentences.chinese: 黃芩甙和地塞米松組水腫明顯減輕。

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the effect of prenatal administration of dexamethasone (DEX) on the development of pulmonary alveoli in newborn rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察產前注射地塞米松對仔鼠肺泡發育的影響。

sentences.english: A DEXA scan is a painless test that detects the density of bones.
sentences.chinese: 一地塞米松掃描是一種無痛性測試，檢測的密度骨頭。

sentences.english: There are two different types of DEXA scanning devices, central and peripheral.
sentences.chinese: 有兩種不同類型的地塞米松掃描裝置，中樞和外周。

sentences.english: Dexamethasone should be considered for short-term palliation.
sentences.chinese: 地塞米松應當被用於短期緩解使用。

sentences.english: Local dexamethasone immunity regulation therapy for HT is obviously efficacious.
sentences.chinese: 地塞米松局部注射治療橋本病療效顯著。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
